Welcome.

Hi! My name is Nicholas Chedid and I'm a Network and Information Systems Engineering student at Porto University, Portugal. You can learn more about me and find my Resume on this page.

I really like exploring the world of web development (focus on front-end) and Network & Security. Right now I'm looking for a summer internship (mid july ~ mid september) on those topics. If you have a position let me know at nicholasfc@gmail.com

So far I don't have any project worth showcasing but you can read what I've been up to at my blog. And all my code can be found at my github.

Feel free to look around.
